thread.title: If I don't learn to adapt, I will be obsolete
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor: If I don't learn to adapt, I will be obsolete - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: If I don't learn to adapt, I will be obsolete
text:
*Q. After Haider (2014), you seem to have become more careful about your choice of films. You turned down Farzi.
**A.* Yes, a lot has changed. In fact, the change started just before I took up 'Haider'.* Shahid Kapoor *
*Q. After the debacle of 'Mausam' (2011)?*
*A.* Not really. I am proud of 'Mausam'. It's just that it didn't ... Â»
